original_text: And the seven thin ears devoured the seven rank and full ears. And Pharaoh awoke, and, behold, it was a dream.
korean_text: 그 가는 일곱 이삭이 무성하고 충실한 일곱 이삭을 삼킨지라 바로가 깬즉 꿈이라

sentences.original_text: devoured the seven rank and full ears
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱 개의 살찌고 솔찍한 이삭들을 삼켰다

sentences.original_text: and, behold, it was a dream
